price: 67. Jis (Khidr) tarė: „Iš tiesų, tu neturėsi kantrybės su manimi!“
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
